result.html: Chuaigh sí ag siopadóireachtI am going shopping.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ag siopadóireaċtI am going shopping.

result.eng: Where do you usually go shopping?
result.html: Cá mbíonn sibh ag siopadóireachtWhere do you usually go shopping?
result.ponchtml: Cá mbíonn siḃ ag siopadóireaċtWhere do you usually go shopping?

result.ga: Is fuath liom bheith ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Is fuath liom bheith ag siopadóireacht
result.html: Is fuath liom bheith ag siopadóireachtI hate shopping.
result.ponchtml: Is fuaṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag siopadóireaċtI hate shopping.

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.html: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireachtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ponchtml: Aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: I hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.
result.ga: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libh
result.orig: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libh
result.html: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libhI hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.
result.ponchtml: Is fuaṫ liom a ḃeiṫ ag siopadóireaċt aċ go n-éirí sé liḃI hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.html: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámhaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann ionad siopadóireaċta cúpla teaċ táḃairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snáṁaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.

result.eng: It's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ga: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.orig: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.html: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé gar do lár an ḃaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireaċtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
